title: Ticket #639: Automatically generate default log file if node job lacks one
description: Just wanted to create a ticket to make sure this doesn't get forgotten -- it's an extension of the lazy log file evaluation (gittrac #328). If a submit file lacks a log file specification, we can use the -append flag to condor_submit to add a default log file. (The plan is to use a single log file for all node jobs that are missing a log file specification.)
creator: wenger
